Package com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArraySerializer<T>
    An XML serializer for arrays of objects from the type variable's class.
    DateArraySerializer
    An XML serializer for arrays of dates expressed as Longs.
    DateSerializer
    An XML serializer for dates expressed as Longs in milliseconds.
    DurationArraySerializer
    An XML serializer for arrays of durations expressed as Longs in milliseconds.
    DurationSerializer
    An XML serializer for durations expressed as Longs in milliseconds.
    EnumSerializer<T extends Enum<T>>
    An XML serializer for any enum type, using Enum.toString() and Enum.valueOf(Class, String).
    ObjectSerializer<T>
    An XML serializer for any class whose non-transient fields have a corresponding Serializer.
    Serializer<T>
    An XML serializer for the class given to the constructor, which also corresponds to the type variable of this generic class.
    SimpleSerializer<T>
    An XML serializer for any class simple enough to be serialized as a String .
